ygData.subject: Re: Level 61
ygData.msgSnippet: You can buy the spell, BUT YOU CAN NOT SCRIBE OR MEMORIZE THE SPELL OF ANOTHER MAGIC CLASS. ... _______________________________________________________________
ygData.messageBody:
You can buy the spell, BUT YOU CAN NOT SCRIBE OR MEMORIZE THE SPELL OF
ANOTHER MAGIC CLASS.

>From: Lakecya Smith <widdowsson@...>
>
>Ahh but if you were to buy the scroll now, whilst it was still lev 61???
>
>
>kalekona@... wrote:
> >
> > From: <kalekona@...>
> >
> > You will not be able to EVER get spells that are for other
> > classes.
> >
> > They will most likely make the scrolls say You cannot use
> > this till 81 later.
> >
